The Identity WG meets biweekly on Wednesdays noon EST-EDT. (Next meeting: October 4th, 2017) alternates with Architecture WG meetings)

Join the call: https://www.uberconference.com/hyperledger-community
Optional dial in number: 401-283-2000,,,4807579435#
No PIN needed
Regional dial in numbers can be found here: https://www.uberconference.com/international

Read the Identity WG meeting minutes, join the RocketChat #identity-wg channel.

Meeting Contact: Vipin Bharathan, BNP Paribas vipinsun@gmail.com

Notes from Meetings

Notes for all meetings are shared in a single document, a shared Google Docs file: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nVkjhSlghjc4KFWEYDU2B0ztWCFh1CK8a7VmqwFsnKY/edit?usp=sharing

Recordings & Slides from Meetings

  • Recordings

Ethereum and uPort

On August 10, 2016 Christian Lundkvist shared with the Hyperledger Identity WG how identity works with Ethereum and how the uPort smart contract architecture extends that model.

The recording for this session is at: https://meetings.webex.com/collabs/url/4fOxESiQ1vKyF2kMBDfdppKXDPJdqE_2hzAvrDz3Ff000000

The slides are at: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8ljfcu22clqgj5k/hyperledger_uport.pdf?dl=0

Membership Services Architecture

In July 2016, we held 3 meetings on the topic of IBMâ€™s Membership Services architecture as used by Hyperledger Fabric. This model has changed quite a bit-20170809 vb

The recording of the 1st Identity WG meeting is available at: https://meetings.webex.com/collabs/url/i-271A2F8IRqjuDCoiWed_-ISAS5bOQTOm-1Vi5O_GS00000

Identity WG May 2016 F2F

The Identity Working Group (WG) held a meeting as part of the face-to-face technical session hosted by the DTCC on May 5, 2016.

The raw notes from the session are on the following pages:

  • identity-wg-potential-substreams
  • identity-wg-potential-work-items
  • https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Identity-WG---Use-Cases-Inventory
